17 double lag_from_lgQ(double lgQ)
18 {
19  return 15.0 / (16.0 * M_PI * std::pow(10.0, lgQ));
20 }

22 EvolvingStar *create_star(double mass,
23  double feh,
24  double wind_strength,
25  double wind_saturation_frequency,
26  double diff_rot_coupling_timescale,
27  const MESAInterpolator *interpolator)
28 {
29  return reinterpret_cast<EvolvingStar*>(
30  new Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar(
31  mass,
32  feh,
33  wind_strength,
34  wind_saturation_frequency,
35  diff_rot_coupling_timescale,
36  *reinterpret_cast<const StellarEvolution::MESA::Interpolator*>(
37  interpolator
38  )
39  )
40  );
41 }

44 void destroy_star(EvolvingStar *star)
45 {
46  delete reinterpret_cast<Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar*>(star);
47 }
48 
49 void set_star_dissipation(EvolvingStar *star,
50  unsigned zone_index,
51  unsigned num_tidal_frequency_breaks,
52  unsigned num_spin_frequency_breaks,
53  double *tidal_frequency_breaks,
54  double *spin_frequency_breaks,
55  double *tidal_frequency_powers,
56  double *spin_frequency_powers,
57  double reference_phase_lag)
58 {
59  Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar* real_star =
60  reinterpret_cast<Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar*>(star);
61  Evolve::BrokenPowerlawPhaseLagZone *zone;
62  if(zone_index == 0) zone = &(real_star->envelope());
63  else zone = &(real_star->core());
64 
65 #ifndef NDEBUG
66  std::cerr << "Setting zone "
67  << zone_index
68  << " dissipation with "
69  << num_tidal_frequency_breaks
70  << " tidal and "
71  << num_spin_frequency_breaks
72  << " spin frequency breaks."
73  << std::endl;
74 #endif
75 
76  set_zone_dissipation(
77  reinterpret_cast<BrokenPowerlawPhaseLagZone*>(zone),
78  num_tidal_frequency_breaks,
79  num_spin_frequency_breaks,
80  tidal_frequency_breaks,
81  spin_frequency_breaks,
82  tidal_frequency_powers,
83  spin_frequency_powers,
84  reference_phase_lag
85  );
86 }

90  reinterpret_cast<Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar*>(

103 double modified_phase_lag(const EvolvingStar *star,
104  unsigned zone_index,
105  int orbital_frequency_multiplier,
106  int spin_frequency_multiplier,
107  double forcing_frequency,
108  int entry,
109  double *above_lock_value)
110 {
111  return reinterpret_cast<const Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar*>(
112  star
113  )->zone(zone_index).modified_phase_lag(
114  orbital_frequency_multiplier,
115  spin_frequency_multiplier,
116  forcing_frequency,
117  static_cast<Evolve::Dissipation::QuantityEntry>(entry),
118  *above_lock_value
119  );
120 }

136 double luminosity(EvolvingStar *star, double age)
137 {
138  const Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar *actual_star =
139  reinterpret_cast<const Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar*>(
140  star
141  );
142  actual_star->select_interpolation_region(age);
143  return actual_star->luminosity(age);
144 }
145 
146 void luminosity_array(EvolvingStar *star,
147  const double *age,
148  unsigned nvalues,
149  double *result)
150 {
151  Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar *actual_star =
152  reinterpret_cast<Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar*>(
153  star
154  );
155  for(unsigned i = 0; i < nvalues; ++i) {
156  if(
157  i == 0
158  ||
159  age[i] < age[i - 1]
160  )
161  actual_star->select_interpolation_region(age[i]);
162  else
163  actual_star->reached_critical_age(age[i]);
164  result[i] = actual_star->luminosity(age[i]);
165  }
166 }
167 
168 double core_inertia(EvolvingStar *star, double age)
169 {
170  const Star::EvolvingStellarCore &core =
171  reinterpret_cast<const Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar*>(
172  star
173  )->core();
174  core.select_interpolation_region(age);
175  return core.moment_of_inertia(age);
176 }
177 
178 void zone_inertia_array(Star::EvolvingStellarZone &zone,
179  const double *age,
180  unsigned nvalues,
181  double *result)
182 {
183  for(unsigned i = 0; i < nvalues; ++i) {
184  if(
185  i == 0
186  ||
187  age[i] < age[i - 1]
188  )
189  zone.select_interpolation_region(age[i]);
190  else
191  zone.reached_critical_age(age[i]);
192  result[i] = zone.moment_of_inertia(age[i]);
193  }
194 }

247 void star_radius_array(EvolvingStar *star,
248  const double *age,
249  unsigned nvalues,
250  double *result)
251 {
252  Star::EvolvingStellarZone &zone =
253  reinterpret_cast<Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar*>(
254  star
255  )->envelope();
256  for(unsigned i = 0; i < nvalues; ++i) {
257  if(
258  i == 0
259  ||
260  age[i] < age[i - 1]
261  )
262  zone.select_interpolation_region(age[i]);
263  else
264  zone.reached_critical_age(age[i]);
265  result[i] = zone.outer_radius(age[i]);
266  }
